Question: Which statements are true regarding the contributions of Mike Myers and George S. Clinton to the Austin Powers films?
Options:
A. Mike Myers starred in and produced the Austin Powers films.
B. George S. Clinton composed the score for the Austin Powers films.
C. Mike Myers was involved in writing the Austin Powers films.
D. George S. Clinton composed the original score for the film.
Answer: A) Mike Myers starred in and produced the Austin Powers films., B) George S. Clinton composed the score for the Austin Powers films., C) Mike Myers was involved in writing the Austin Powers films., D) George S. Clinton composed the original score for the film.
